definition[0]: (1977-) a US rapperrecord producer who was born in Atlanta, Georgia. He has produced successful records for many other musicians such as Jay-Z, Alicia Keys, Nas, and Janet Jackson. As a solo artist his singles have included Gold Digger (2005) (with Jamie Foxx), Stronger (2007), and Heartless (2008). Among his albums are Graduation (2007), 808s & Heartbreak (2008), and My Beautiful Dark Twisted Fantasy (2010).
